metadata.name: PUA - RunXCmd Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the RunXCmd tool to execute commands with System or TrustedInstaller accounts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /account=system ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /account=ti '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/exec=')))

output.summary: Detects the use of the RunXCmd tool to execute commands with System or TrustedInstaller accounts

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Legitimate use by administrators References: https://www.d7xtech.com/free-software/runx/, https://www.winhelponline.com/blog/run-program-as-system-localsystem-account-windows/
